trans-unit.source: See the examples in the DERIVATIVE() documentation. NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE() behaves the same as the DERIVATIVE() function but NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE() returns only positive rates of change or rates of change that equal zero.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 DERIVATIVE() 文档中的示例。 NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE() 的行为与 DERIVATIVE() 函数相同，但 NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE() 仅返回正的变化率或等于零的变化率。

trans-unit.source: See the examples in the DIFFERENCE() documentation. NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE() behaves the same as the DIFFERENCE() function but NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE() returns only positive differences or differences that equal zero.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 DIFFERENCE() 文档中的示例。 NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE() 的行为与 DIFFERENCE() 函数相同，但 NON_NEGATIVE_DIFFERENCE() 仅返回正差或等于零的差。

trans-unit.source: Self-signed certificates are not signed by a CA and you can generate them on your own machine. Unlike CA-signed certificates, self-signed certificates only provide cryptographic security to HTTPS requests. They do not allow clients to verify the identity of the InfluxDB server. We recommend using a self-signed certificate if you are unable to obtain a CA-signed certificate. With this certificate option, every InfluxDB instance requires a unique self-signed certificate.
trans-unit.target: 自签名证书不是由CA签名的，您可以在自己的计算机上生成它们。与CA签名证书不同，自签名证书仅为HTTPS请求提供加密安全性。它们不允许客户端验证InfluxDB服务器的身份。如果您无法获得CA签名的证书，我们建议使用自签名证书。使用此证书选项，每个InfluxDB实例都需要一个唯一的自签名证书。

trans-unit.source: Service input plugins are input plugins that run in a passive collection mode while the Telegraf agent is running. They listen on a socket for known protocol inputs, or apply their own logic to ingested metrics before delivering them to the Telegraf agent.
trans-unit.target: 服务输入插件是在Telegraf代理运行时以被动收集模式运行的输入插件。它们在套接字上监听已知的协议输入,或在向Telegraf代理提供这些数据之前,将自己的逻辑应用于摄入的指标。

trans-unit.source: Shard groups are logical containers for shards. Shard groups are organized by time and retention policy. Every retention policy that contains data has at least one associated shard group. A given shard group contains all shards with data for the interval covered by the shard group. The interval spanned by each shard group is the shard duration.
trans-unit.target: Shard组是Shard的逻辑容器。Shard组按时间和保留策略组织。每个包含数据的保留策略都有至少一个相关的碎片组。一个给定的碎片组包含了该碎片组所覆盖的区间内的所有数据碎片。每个Shard组所跨越的区间就是Shard持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Since InfluxDB is running on http://localhost:8086 Kapacitor finds it during start up and creates several subscriptions on InfluxDB. These subscriptions tell InfluxDB to send all the data it receives to Kapacitor. You should see some basic start up messages and something about listening on UDP port and starting subscriptions. At this point InfluxDB is streaming the data it is receiving from Telegraf to Kapacitor.
trans-unit.target: 由于InfluxDB在 http://localhost:8086 上运行，因此Kapacitor在启动过程中会找到它并在InfluxDB上创建多个订阅。这些订阅告诉InfluxDB将接收到的所有数据发送到Kapacitor。您应该看到一些基本的启动消息，以及有关侦听UDP端口和启动订阅的信息。此时，InfluxDB正在将从Telegraf接收的数据流式传输到Kapacitor。

trans-unit.target: 由于TICKscript是其自己的语言，我们构建了一个类似于godoc的小实用程序，名为tickdoc。 tickdoc 根据代码中的注释生成文档。该 tickdoc 实用理解两个特殊的意见，以帮助它生成干净的文件。

trans-unit.source: Since we already have the data recorded, we can just replay the data as fast as possible instead of waiting for real time to pass. If -real was set, then the data would be replayed by waiting for the deltas between the timestamps to pass, though the result is identical whether real time passes or not. This is because time is measured on each node by the data points it receives.
trans-unit.target: 由于我们已经记录了数据，因此我们可以尽可能快地重播数据，而不必等待实时通过。如果设置了 -real ，则将通过等待时间戳之间的增量来重播数据，尽管无论实时与否，结果都是相同的。这是因为时间是通过每个节点接收的数据点来测量的。

trans-unit.source: Since we are writing data back to InfluxDB create a database game for our results.
trans-unit.target: 由于我们将数据写回到InfluxDB，因此请为我们的结果创建一个数据库 game 。

trans-unit.source: Some InfluxQL functions support nesting of other functions. Most do not. If your function does not support nesting, you can get the same functionality using a CQ to calculate the inner-most function. Then simply query the CQ results to calculate the outer-most function.
trans-unit.target: 一些InfluxQL函数支持其他函数的嵌套。大多数不这样做。如果您的函数不支持嵌套，则可以使用CQ计算最里面的函数来获得相同的功能。然后只需查询CQ结果以计算最外面的函数。

trans-unit.source: Some InfluxQL functions support nesting in the SELECT clause:
trans-unit.target: 一些InfluxQL函数支持 SELECT 子句中的嵌套：

trans-unit.source: Some customers may choose to install InfluxDB with public internet access, however doing so can inadvertently expose your data and invite unwelcome attacks on your database. Check out the sections below for how protect the data in your InfluxDB instance.
trans-unit.target: 有些客户可能会选择在公共互联网上安装InfluxDB,但是这样做可能会无意中暴露您的数据,并招致对您的数据库的不受欢迎的攻击。请查看以下章节,了解如何保护InfluxDB实例中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Some examples of TICKscripts built against common Telegraf plugin data.
trans-unit.target: 一些针对常见Telegraf插件数据建立的TICKscripts的例子。

trans-unit.source: Some iterators are more complex or need to be implemented at a higher level. For example, the DERIVATIVE() needs to retrieve all points for a window first before performing the calculation. This iterator is created by the engine itself and is never requested to be created by the lower levels.
trans-unit.target: 一些迭代器更复杂，或者需要在更高级别上实现。例如，在执行计算之前， DERIVATIVE() 需要首先检索窗口的所有点。该迭代器是由引擎本身创建的，决不要求较低级别的迭代器创建。

trans-unit.source: Some users were able to get past this by putting InfluxDB on big hardware with near unlimited IOPS. However, most users are on VMs with limited resources in the cloud. We had to figure out a way to reduce the impact of writing a bunch of points into hundreds of thousands of series at a time.
trans-unit.target: 有些用户通过把InfluxDB放在大硬件上,近乎无限的IOPS,就能过关。然而,大多数用户都是在云端资源有限的虚拟机上。我们必须想办法减少一次把一堆点写成几十万个系列的影响。

trans-unit.source: Something so simple as defining an alert can quickly be extended to apply to a much larger scope. With the above script, you will be alerted if any service in any datacenter deviates more than 3 standard deviations away from normal behavior as defined by the historical 95th percentile of cpu usage, within 1 minute!
trans-unit.target: 像定义一个警报这样简单的东西,可以迅速扩展到更大的范围。使用上面的脚本,如果任何数据中心的任何服务在1分钟内偏离正常行为3个标准差以上,你就会收到警报,而正常行为的定义是cpu使用率的历史第95百分位数。

trans-unit.source: Sorted Merge Iterator - This iterator also combines one or more iterators into a new iterator of the same type. However, this iterator guarantees time ordering of every point. This makes it slower than the MergeIterator but this ordering guarantee is required for non-aggregate queries which return the raw data points.
trans-unit.target: 排序的合并迭代器-此迭代器还将一个或多个迭代器组合到相同类型的新迭代器中。但是，此迭代器可保证每个点的时间排序。这使其比 MergeIterator 慢，但是对于返回原始数据点的非聚合查询，此排序保证是必需的。

trans-unit.source: StrContains reports whether substr is within s.
trans-unit.target: StrContains报告substr是否在s内。

trans-unit.source: StrContainsAny reports whether any Unicode code points in chars are within s.
trans-unit.target: StrContainsAny报告是否有Unicode码点在s内。

trans-unit.source: StrCount counts the number of non-overlapping instances of sep in s. If sep is an empty string, Count returns 1 + the number of Unicode code points in s.
trans-unit.target: StrCount计算sep在s中的非重叠实例的数量。如果sep是一个空字符串,Count返回1+s中的Unicode码点数量。

trans-unit.source: StrHasPrefix tests whether the string s begins with prefix.
trans-unit.target: StrHasPrefix测试字符串s是否以前缀开始。

trans-unit.source: StrHasSuffix tests whether the string s ends with suffix.
trans-unit.target: StrHasSuffix测试字符串s是否以后缀结束。

trans-unit.source: StrIndex returns the index of the first instance of sep in s, or -1 if sep is not present in s.
trans-unit.target: StrIndex返回s中sep的第一个实例的索引,如果sep不存在,则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: StrIndexAny returns the index of the first instance of any Unicode code point from chars in s, or -1 if no Unicode code point from chars is present in s.
trans-unit.target: StrIndexAny返回s中任何来自chars的Unicode码点的第一个实例的索引,如果s中没有来自chars的Unicode码点,则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: StrLastIndex returns the index of the last instance of sep in s, or -1 if sep is not present in s.
trans-unit.target: StrLastIndex 返回 sep 在 s 中最后一个实例的索引,如果 sep 不存在,则返回 -1。

trans-unit.source: StrLastIndexAny returns the index of the last instance of any Unicode code point from chars in s, or -1 if no Unicode code point from chars is present in s.
trans-unit.target: StrLastIndexAny返回s中来自chars的任何Unicode码点的最后一个实例的索引,如果s中没有来自chars的Unicode码点,则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: StrLength returns the length of the string.
trans-unit.target: StrLength 返回字符串的长度。

trans-unit.source: StrReplace returns a copy of the string s with the first n non-overlapping instances of old replaced by new.
trans-unit.target: StrReplace 返回字符串 s 的副本,并将前 n 个非重叠的旧实例替换为新实例。

trans-unit.source: StrSubstring returns a substring based on the given indexes, strSubstring(str, start, stop) is equivalent to str[start:stop] in Go.
trans-unit.target: StrSubstring根据给定的索引返回一个子串,strSubstring(str,start,stop)相当于Go中的str[start:stop]。

trans-unit.source: StrToLower returns a copy of the string s with all Unicode letters mapped to their lower case.
trans-unit.target: StrToLower 返回字符串 s 的副本,并将所有 Unicode 字母映射为小写。

trans-unit.source: StrToUpper returns a copy of the string s with all Unicode letters mapped to their upper case.
trans-unit.target: StrToUpper 返回字符串 s 的副本,并将所有 Unicode 字母映射为大写。

trans-unit.source: StrTrim returns a slice of the string s with all leading and trailing Unicode code points contained in cutset removed.
trans-unit.target: StrTrim 返回字符串 s 的一个片断,其中包含在 cutet 中的所有前导和后导 Unicode 码点。

trans-unit.source: StrTrimLeft returns a slice of the string s with all leading Unicode code points contained in cutset removed.
trans-unit.target: StrTrimLeft 返回字符串 s 的一个片断,其中包含在 cutet 中的所有前导 Unicode 码点。

trans-unit.source: StrTrimPrefix returns s without the provided leading prefix string. If s doesn’t start with prefix, s is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: StrTrimPrefix返回s而不提供提供的前导前缀字符串。如果s不以前缀开头，则s不变返回。

trans-unit.source: StrTrimRight returns a slice of the string s, with all trailing Unicode code points contained in cutset removed.
trans-unit.target: StrTrimRight返回字符串s的一个片断,并删除所有包含在cuteset中的尾部Unicode码点。

trans-unit.source: StrTrimSpace returns a slice of the string s, with all leading and trailing white space removed, as defined by Unicode.
trans-unit.target: StrTrimSpace返回字符串s的一个片断,按照Unicode的定义,去掉了所有前导和尾部的空白。

trans-unit.source: StrTrimSuffix returns s without the provided trailing suffix string. If s doesn’t end with suffix, s is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: StrTrimSuffix返回s，但不提供结尾的后缀字符串。如果s不以后缀结尾，则s不变返回。

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions allow Kapacitor to receive data from InfluxDB in a push model rather than the pull model based on querying data. When Kapacitor is configured to work with InfluxDB, the subscription will automatically push every write for the subscribed database from InfluxDB to Kapacitor. Subscriptions can use TCP or UDP for transmitting the writes.
trans-unit.target: 订阅使Kapacitor能够以推送模型而不是基于查询数据的拉模型从InfluxDB接收数据。当Kapacitor配置为可与InfluxDB一起使用时，订阅将自动将已订阅数据库的每次写入从InfluxDB推送到Kapacitor。订阅可以使用TCP或UDP传输写操作。

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions tell InfluxDB to send all the data it receives to Kapacitor.
trans-unit.target: 订阅通知InfluxDB将接收到的所有数据发送到Kapacitor。

trans-unit.source: Tags are optional. You don’t need to have tags in your data structure, but it’s generally a good idea to make use of them because, unlike fields, tags are indexed. This means that queries on tags are faster and that tags are ideal for storing commonly-queried metadata.
trans-unit.target: 标签是可选的。您不需要在数据结构中包含标签，但是使用它们通常是一个好主意，因为与字段不同，标签是被索引的。这意味着对标签的查询速度更快，并且标签非常适合存储常见查询的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Telegraf is an agent written in Go for collecting metrics and writing them into InfluxDB or other possible outputs. This guide will get you up and running with Telegraf. It walks you through the download, installation, and configuration processes, and it shows how to use Telegraf to get data into InfluxDB.
trans-unit.target: Telegraf是一个用Go编写的代理,用于收集指标并将其写入InfluxDB或其他可能的输出。本指南将让你了解并使用Telegraf。它将引导您完成下载、安装和配置过程,并展示如何使用Telegraf将数据写入InfluxDB。

trans-unit.source: Telegraf is entirely input driven. It gathers all metrics from the inputs specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Telegraf是完全由输入驱动的。它从配置文件中指定的输入中收集所有指标。

trans-unit.source: Telegraf is part of the FreeBSD package system. It can be installed by running:

trans-unit.source: Telegraf now supports two new types of plugins: processors & aggregators.

trans-unit.source: Telegraf offers multiple service plugins that may require custom ports. All port mappings can be modified through the configuration file which is located at /etc/telegraf/telegraf.conf for default installations.

trans-unit.source: Telegraf uses a host’s local time in UTC to assign timestamps to data. Use the Network Time Protocol (NTP) to synchronize time between hosts; if hosts’ clocks aren’t synchronized with NTP, the timestamps on the data can be inaccurate.
trans-unit.target: Telegraf使用UTC中主机的本地时间为数据分配时间戳。使用网络时间协议（NTP）同步主机之间的时间；如果主机的时钟未与NTP同步，则数据上的时间戳可能不准确。

trans-unit.source: That query creates a CQ called cq_30m in the database food_data. cq_30m tells InfluxDB to calculate the 30-minute average of the two fields website and phone in the measurement orders and in the DEFAULT RP two_hours. It also tells InfluxDB to write those results to the measurement downsampled_orders in the retention policy a_year with the field keys mean_website and mean_phone. InfluxDB will run this query every 30 minutes for the previous 30 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在数据库 food_data 中创建一个名为 cq_30m 的CQ 。 cq_30m 告诉InfluxDB 在测量 orders 和在 DEFAULT RP two_hours 中计算两个字段 website 和 phone 的30分钟平均值。它还告诉InfluxDB写这些结果测量 downsampled_orders 在保留策略 a_year 与现场键 mean_website 和 mean_phone 。 InfluxDB将在前30分钟每30分钟运行一次此查询。

trans-unit.source: That query creates an RP called a_year that exists in the database food_data. a_year keeps data for a DURATION of 52 weeks (52w). Leaving out the DEFAULT argument ensures that a_year is not the DEFAULT RP for the database food_data. That is, write and read operations against food_data that do not specify an RP will still go to the two_hours RP (the DEFAULT RP).
trans-unit.target: 该查询将创建一个名为 a_year 的RP ，该RP 存在于数据库 food_data 中。 a_year 保留 DURATION 52周（ 52w ）的数据。离开了 DEFAULT 参数确保 a_year 不是 DEFAULT 数据库RP food_data 。也就是说，针对 food_data 的未指定RP的写入和读取操作仍将进入 two_hours RP（ DEFAULT RP）。

trans-unit.source: That query creates an RP called two_hours that exists in the database food_data. two_hours keeps data for a DURATION of two hours (2h) and it’s the DEFAULT RP for the database food_data.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将创建一个在数据库 food_data 中存在的称为 two_hours 的RP 。 two_hours 将数据保留 DURATION 的两个小时（ 2h ），这是数据库 food_data 的 DEFAULT RP 。

trans-unit.source: That query outputs the data in the foodships measure where the timestamp is newer than the server’s current time minus one hour. The options for specifying time durations with now() are:
trans-unit.target: 该查询输出的数据 foodships 测量，其中时间戳比服务器的当前时间减去1小时更新。使用 now() 指定持续时间的选项是：

trans-unit.source: The “value” data format translates single values into Telegraf metrics. This is done by assigning a measurement name and setting a single field (“value”) as the parsed metric.

trans-unit.source: The 1.3 output from the queries SHOW DATABASES,SHOW USERS and SHOW RETENTION POLICIES ON <database_name> should match the 0.10 or 0.11 output.

trans-unit.source: The advanced GROUP BY time() syntax allows users to shift the start time of InfluxDB’s preset time boundaries. Example 3 in the Advanced Syntax section continues with the query shown here; it shifts forward the preset time boundaries by six minutes such that InfluxDB returns:

trans-unit.source: The backreference syntax (:MEASUREMENT) maintains the source measurement names in the destination database. Note that both the copy_NOAA_water_database database and its autogen retention policy must exist prior to running the INTO query. See Database Management for how to manage databases and retention policies.
trans-unit.target: 所述反向引用语法（ :MEASUREMENT ）维持在目标数据库中的源测量名称。请注意，这两个 copy_NOAA_water_database 数据库及其 autogen 保留策略之前，必须在运行中存在 INTO 查询。有关如何管理数据库和保留策略，请参见数据库管理。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT clause specifies an InfluxQL function. The FROM clause specifies a single measurement. The WHERE clause specifies the time range for the query. The GROUP BY clause groups results by all tags (*) and into 12-minute intervals. The ORDER BY time DESC clause returns results in descending timestamp order. The LIMIT 2 clause limits the number of points returned to two. The OFFSET 2 clause excludes the first two averages from the query results. The SLIMIT 1 clause limits the number of series returned to one. The SOFFSET 1 clause paginates the series returned.
trans-unit.target: 在 SELECT 子句指定一个InfluxQL 功能。该 FROM 子句指定单个测量。在 WHERE 子句指定查询的时间范围。在 GROUP BY 子句中的所有标签（组结果 * ），并为12分钟一班。该 ORDER BY time DESC 子句降序时间戳顺序返回结果。所述 LIMIT 2 子句限制点的数目返回到2。该 OFFSET 2 条款排除从查询结果中的前两个平均值。该 SLIMIT 1 条将返回的序列数限制为一个。在 SOFFSET 1 条款进行分页返回的系列。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT clause specifies an InfluxQL function. The FROM clause specifies a single measurement. The WHERE clause specifies the time range for the query. The GROUP BY clause groups results by all tags (*) and into 12-minute intervals. The ORDER BY time DESC clause returns results in descending timestamp order. The LIMIT 2 clause limits the number of points returned to two. The OFFSET 2 clause excludes the first two averages from the query results. The SLIMIT 1 clause limits the number of series returned to one.
trans-unit.target: 在 SELECT 子句指定一个InfluxQL 功能。该 FROM 子句指定单个测量。在 WHERE 子句指定查询的时间范围。在 GROUP BY 子句中的所有标签（组结果 * ），并为12分钟一班。该 ORDER BY time DESC 子句降序时间戳顺序返回结果。所述 LIMIT 2 子句限制点的数目返回到2。该 OFFSET 2 子句排除从查询结果中的前两个平均值。该 SLIMIT 1 条 将返回的序列数限制为一个。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT clause supports specifying a field’s type and basic cast operations with the :: syntax.
trans-unit.target: 在 SELECT 子句支持指定字段的使用类型和基本类型转换操作 :: 语法。

trans-unit.source: The Time Syntax section on this page details how to specify alternative time ranges in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 本页上的时间语法部分详细介绍了如何在 WHERE 子句中指定替代时间范围。

trans-unit.source: The max-row-limit configuration option allows users to limit the maximum number of returned results to prevent InfluxDB from running out of memory while it aggregates the results. The max-row-limit configuration option is set to 0 by default. That default setting allows for an unlimited number of rows returned per request.
trans-unit.target: 的 max-row-limit 配置选项允许用户从同时聚集结果的内存不多了限制返回搜索结果，阻止InfluxDB的最大数量。默认情况下， max-row-limit 配置选项设置为 0 。该默认设置允许每个请求返回无限数量的行。

trans-unit.source: The field(s) for your data point. Every data point requires at least one field in Line Protocol.
trans-unit.target: 您的数据点的字段。每个数据点在线路协议中至少需要一个字段。

trans-unit.source: The tag(s) that you want to include with your data point. Tags are optional in Line Protocol. Notice that the measurement and tag set are separated by a comma and no spaces.
trans-unit.target: 您想要包含在数据点中的标签。标签在线路协议中是可选的。请注意，度量和标签集用逗号分隔，没有空格。

trans-unit.source: The timestamp for your data point in nanosecond-precision Unix time. The timestamp is optional in Line Protocol. If you do not specify a timestamp for your data point InfluxDB uses the server’s local nanosecond timestamp in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 数据点的时间戳记，以ns为单位的Unix时间。时间戳在线路协议中是可选的。如果您没有为数据点指定时间戳，则InfluxDB使用服务器的本地UTC纳秒时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The TSM storage engine file format is now at version 1. While we may introduce new versions of the format in the 1.x releases, these new versions will run side-by-side with previous versions. What this means for users is there will be no lengthy migrations when upgrading from one 1.x release to another.
trans-unit.target: 该TSM现在存储引擎的文件格式是在1版本虽然我们可能会推出1.x版本格式的新版本，这些新版本将与以前的版本上运行并排侧。对于用户而言，这意味着从一个1.x版本升级到另一个版本时，不会进行长时间的迁移。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT statement returns all field values if all values have the same type. If field value types differ across shards, InfluxDB first performs any applicable cast operations and then returns all values with the type that occurs first in the following list: float, integer, string, boolean.
trans-unit.target: 在 SELECT 语句返回所有字段的值，如果所有值都具有相同的类型。如果字段值的类型跨越碎片不同，InfluxDB首先执行任何适用的铸造操作，然后返回的所有值与第一发生在以下列表中的类型：浮子，整数，字符串，布尔值。

trans-unit.source: The SHOW FIELD KEYS query also returns the field’s type.
trans-unit.target: 在 SHOW FIELD KEYS 查询还返回字段的类型。

trans-unit.source: The CLI returns timestamps in nanosecond epoch format by default. Specify alternative formats with the precision <format> command. The HTTP API returns timestamps in RFC3339 format by default. Specify alternative formats with the epoch query string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，CLI以纳秒纪元格式返回时间戳。使用 precision <format> 命令指定替代格式。默认情况下，HTTP API以RFC3339格式返回时间戳。使用 epoch 查询字符串参数指定其他格式。

trans-unit.source: The -precision argument specifies the format/precision of any returned timestamps. In the example above, rfc3339 tells InfluxDB to return timestamps in RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.nnnnnnnnnZ).
trans-unit.target: 本 -precision 参数指定任何返回的时间戳的格式/精度。在上面的示例中， rfc3339 告诉InfluxDB以RFC3339格式（ YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.nnnnnnnnnZ ）返回时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The password for your InfluxDB instance.
trans-unit.target: 您的InfluxDB实例的密码。

trans-unit.source: The username for your InfluxDB instance.
trans-unit.target: 您的InfluxDB实例的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The getting started guide gets you up and running with Chronograf with as little configuration and code as possible. By the end of the guide, you will have downloaded, installed, and configured all four packages of the TICK stack (Telegraf, InfluxDB, Chronograf, and Kapacitor), and you will be all set to monitor your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 该入门指南让您能与Chronograf尽可能少的配置和代码地运行与。到本指南结束时，您将下载，安装和配置TICK堆栈的所有四个软件包（Telegraf，InfluxDB，Chronograf和Kapacitor），并且所有这些都可以监视基础结构。

trans-unit.source: The -precision argument specifies the format/precision of any returned timestamps. In the example above, rfc3339 tells InfluxDB to return timestamps in RFC3339 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.nnnnnnnnnZ).
trans-unit.target: 本 -precision 参数指定任何返回的时间戳的格式/精度。在上面的示例中， rfc3339 告诉InfluxDB以RFC3339格式（ YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.nnnnnnnnnZ ）返回时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The Riemann output plugin has been rewritten and the previous riemann plugin is incompatible with the new one. The reasons for this are outlined in issue #1878. The previous Riemann output will still be available using outputs.riemann_legacy if needed, but that will eventually be deprecated. It is highly recommended that all users migrate to the new Riemann output plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该黎曼输出插件已经被改写，以前黎曼插件是不兼容的新一个。原因在问题＃1878中概述。如果需要，以前的Riemann输出仍可使用 outputs.riemann_legacy 获得，但最终将不推荐使用。强烈建议所有用户迁移到新的Riemann输出插件。

trans-unit.source: The WhereNode filters the data stream by a given expression.
trans-unit.target: 所述WhereNode过滤由给定表达式的数据流。

trans-unit.source: The installation page lists the requirements for installing, starting, and configuring Chronograf.
trans-unit.target: 在安装页面列出了安装，启动和配置Chronograf的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <field_key>::<type> syntax supports casting field values from integers to floats or from floats to integers. See Cast Operations for an example. There is no way to cast a float or integer to a string or boolean (or vice versa).
trans-unit.target: 所述 <field_key>::<type> 语法支持从整数铸造字段值到浮筒或浮筒从为整数。有关示例，请参见强制转换操作。无法将浮点数或整数强制转换为字符串或布尔值（反之亦然）。

trans-unit.source: The .chatId(), .disableNotification(), .disableWebPagePreview(), and .parseMode() specifications are optional. If they aren’t set in the TICKscript, they default to the chat-id, disable-notification, disable-web-page-preview, and parse-mode settings in the [telegram] section of the configuration file. Note that if global is set to true in the configuration file, there’s no need to specify .telegram() in the TICKscript; Kapacitor sends all alerts to Telegram by default.
trans-unit.target: 该 .chatId() ， .disableNotification() ， .disableWebPagePreview() ，和 .parseMode() 规范是可选的。如果未在TICKscript中设置，则默认为配置文件 [telegram] 部分中的 chat-id ， disable-notification ， disable-web-page-preview 和 parse-mode 设置。请注意，如果在配置文件中将 global 设置为 true ，则无需在 .telegram() 中指定.telegram（）。 Kapacitor默认将所有警报发送到Telegram。

trans-unit.source: The .room() and .token() specifications are optional. If they aren’t set in the TICKscript, they default to the room and token settings in the [hipchat] section of the configuration file. Note that if global is set to true in the configuration file, there’s no need to specify .hipChat() in the TICKscript; Kapacitor sends all alerts to HipChat by default.
trans-unit.target: 该 .room() 和 .token() 规范是可选的。如果未在TICKscript中设置，则默认为配置文件 [hipchat] 部分中的 room 和 token 设置。请注意，如果在配置文件中将 global 设置为 true ，则无需在 .hipChat() 中指定.hipChat（）。Kapacitor默认将所有警报发送到HipChat。

trans-unit.source: The /query endpoint accepts GET and POST HTTP requests. Use this endpoint to query data and manage databases, retention policies, and users.
trans-unit.target: 该 /query 终端接受 GET 和 POST HTTP请求。使用此端点可以查询数据并管理数据库，保留策略和用户。

trans-unit.source: The /write endpoint accepts POST HTTP requests. Use this endpoint to write data to a pre-existing database.
trans-unit.target: 该 /write 端点接受 POST HTTP请求。使用此端点将数据写入到预先存在的数据库。

trans-unit.source: The :: syntax allows users to perform basic cast operations in queries. Currently, InfluxDB supports casting field values from integers to floats or from floats to integers.
trans-unit.target: 该 :: 语法允许用户在查询执行基本的转换操作。当前，InfluxDB支持将字段值从整数转换为浮点数或从浮点转换为整数。

trans-unit.source: The Alert Message section on the Rule Configuration page determines where the system sends the alert (the event handler) and the text that accompanies the alert (the alert message). Chronograf supports several event handlers. Here, we choose to send alerts to Slack, specifically to the existing #chronocats channel.
trans-unit.target: “ 规则配置”页面上的“ Alert Message 部分确定系统将警报发送到的位置（事件处理程序）和警报附带的文本（警报消息）。Chronograf支持多个事件处理程序。在这里，我们选择将警报发送到Slack，特别是现有的 #chronocats 频道。

trans-unit.source: The Authorization callback URL must be the location of the Homepage URL plus /oauth/github/callback. For example, if Homepage URL was http://localhost:8888 then the Authorization callback URL should be http://localhost:8888/oauth/github/callback.
trans-unit.target: 该 Authorization callback URL 必须的位置 Homepage URL 加 /oauth/github/callback 。例如，如果 Homepage URL 为 http://localhost:8888 ,则 Authorization callback URL 应为 http://localhost:8888/oauth/github/callback 。

trans-unit.source: The CREATE USER statement requires single quotation marks around the password string:
trans-unit.target: 在 CREATE USER 语句要求各地密码字符串单引号：

trans-unit.source: The DELETE query deletes all points from a series in a database. Unlike DROP SERIES, it does not drop the series from the index and it supports time intervals in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 该 DELETE 查询从删除所有点系列在数据库中。与 DROP SERIES 不同，它不会从索引中删除序列，并且在 WHERE 子句中支持时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The DROP DATABASE query deletes all of the data, measurements, series, continuous queries, and retention policies from the specified database. The query takes the following form:
trans-unit.target: 该 DROP DATABASE 查询删除所有数据，测量系列，连续查询，并保留从指定的数据库政策。查询采用以下形式：

trans-unit.source: The DROP MEASUREMENT query deletes all data and series from the specified measurement and deletes the measurement from the index.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DROP MEASUREMENT 查询删除从指定的所有数据和一系列测量，并删除从索引测量。

trans-unit.source: The DROP SERIES query deletes all points from a series in a database, and it drops the series from the index.
trans-unit.target: 该 DROP SERIES 查询删除从所有点系列在数据库中，并将其放到从指数系列。

trans-unit.source: The DROP SHARD query deletes a shard. It also drops the shard from the metastore. The query takes the following form:
trans-unit.target: 该 DROP SHARD 查询删除碎片。它还会从metastore删除分片。查询采用以下形式：

trans-unit.source: The DURATION clause determines how long InfluxDB keeps the data. The <duration> is a duration literal or INF (infinite). The minimum duration for a retention policy is one hour and the maximum duration is INF.
trans-unit.target: 该 DURATION 子句决定长期InfluxDB如何保持数据。所述 <duration> 是一个持续时间字面或 INF （无穷大）。保留策略的最小持续时间为一小时，最大持续时间为 INF 。

trans-unit.source: The ELAPSED() function supports the GROUP BY time() clause but the query results aren’t particularly useful. Currently, an ELAPSED() query with a nested function and a GROUP BY time() clause simply returns the interval specified in the GROUP BY time() clause.
trans-unit.target: 的 ELAPSED() 函数支持 GROUP BY time() 子句但查询结果不是特别有用的。当前， ELAPSED() 具有嵌套函数查询和 GROUP BY time() 子句简单地返回在指定的时间间隔 GROUP BY time() 子句。

trans-unit.source: The FROM clause and the WHERE clause are optional. The WHERE clause supports tag comparisons; field comparisons are not valid for the SHOW TAG KEYS query.
trans-unit.target: 在 FROM 子句和 WHERE 子句是可选的。在 WHERE 子句支持标签的比较; 字段比较对于 SHOW TAG KEYS 查询无效。

trans-unit.source: The FROM clause is also optional. See the Data Exploration page for documentation on the FROM clause.
trans-unit.target: 在 FROM 子句是可选的。有关 FROM 子句的文档，请参见数据浏览页面。

trans-unit.source: The FROM clause supports several formats for specifying a measurement(s):
trans-unit.target: 该 FROM 用于指定子句支持多种格式的测量（多个）：

trans-unit.source: The FROM, WHERE, LIMIT, and OFFSET clauses are optional. The WHERE clause supports tag comparisons; field comparisons are not valid for the SHOW SERIES query.
trans-unit.target: 该 FROM ， WHERE ， LIMIT 和 OFFSET 子句是可选的。在 WHERE 子句支持标签的比较; 字段比较对于 SHOW SERIES 查询无效。

trans-unit.source: The FROM, WHERE, LIMIT, and OFFSET clauses are optional. The WHERE clause supports tag comparisons; field comparisons are not valid for the SHOW TAG KEYS query.
trans-unit.target: 该 FROM ， WHERE ， LIMIT 和 OFFSET 子句是可选的。在 WHERE 子句支持标签的比较; 字段比较对于 SHOW TAG KEYS 查询无效。

trans-unit.source: The GROUP BY * clause preserves tags in the source database as tags in the destination database. The following query does not maintain the series context for tags; tags will be stored as fields in the destination database (copy_NOAA_water_database):
trans-unit.target: 在 GROUP BY * 子句蜜饯标签在源数据库作为目标数据库的标签。以下查询不维护标签的系列上下文；标签将作为字段存储在目标数据库（ copy_NOAA_water_database ）中：

trans-unit.source: The GROUP BY time() clause determines the timestamps in the results; each timestamp marks the start of a time interval. That behavior also applies to nested selector functions (like FIRST() or MAX()) which would, in all other cases, return a specific timestamp from the raw data. Because the GROUP BY time() clause overrides the original timestamps, the ELAPSED() calculation always returns the same value as the GROUP BY time() interval.
trans-unit.target: 的 GROUP BY time() 子句决定在结果中的时间戳; 每个时间戳标记一个时间间隔的开始。该行为也适用于嵌套的选择器函数（例如 FIRST() 或 MAX() ），在其他所有情况下，它们将从原始数据返回特定的时间戳。因为 GROUP BY time() 子句将覆盖原始时间戳，所以 ELAPSED() 计算总是返回与 GROUP BY time() 间隔相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The GROUP BY clause groups query results by a user-specified set of tags or a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 的 GROUP BY 子句组查询结果由用户指定的组标签或时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The WITH, DURATION, REPLICATION, SHARD DURATION, and NAME clauses are optional and create a single retention policy associated with the created database. If you do not specify one of the clauses after WITH, the relevant behavior defaults to the autogen retention policy settings. The created retention policy automatically serves as the database’s default retention policy. For more information about those clauses, see Retention Policy Management.
trans-unit.target: 该 WITH ， DURATION ， REPLICATION ， SHARD DURATION 和 NAME 子句是可选的，创建一个单一的保留策略与创建的数据库相关联。如果不指定后的条款之一 WITH ，相关行为默认为 autogen 保留策略设置。创建的保留策略自动用作数据库的默认保留策略。有关这些条款的更多信息，请参见保留策略管理。

trans-unit.source: The expected identifier error occurs when InfluxDB anticipates an identifier in a query but doesn’t find it. Identifiers are tokens that refer to continuous query names, database names, field keys, measurement names, retention policy names, subscription names, tag keys, and user names. The error is often a gentle reminder to double-check your query’s syntax.

trans-unit.source: The measurement acts as a container for tags, fields, and the time column, and the measurement name is the description of the data that are stored in the associated fields. Measurement names are strings, and, for any SQL users out there, a measurement is conceptually similar to a table. The only measurement in the sample data is census. The name census tells us that the field values record the number of butterflies and honeybees - not their size, direction, or some sort of happiness index.
trans-unit.target: 所述测量充当标记，字段的容器中，和 time 栏，并且测量名称是存储在相关联的字段的数据的描述。度量名称是字符串，对于那里的任何SQL用户，度量在概念上都类似于表。样本数据中唯一的度量是 census 。 census 的名称告诉我们，该字段值记录的是 butterflies 和 honeybees 的数量-而不是它们的大小，方向或某种幸福指数。

trans-unit.source: The Batch and Point Methods
trans-unit.target: 批量法和点数法

trans-unit.source: The Cache exposes a few controls for snapshotting behavior. The two most important controls are the memory limits. There is a lower bound, cache-snapshot-memory-size, which when exceeded will trigger a snapshot to TSM files and remove the corresponding WAL segments. There is also an upper bound, cache-max-memory-size, which when exceeded will cause the Cache to reject new writes. These configurations are useful to prevent out of memory situations and to apply back pressure to clients writing data faster than the instance can persist it. The checks for memory thresholds occur on every write.
trans-unit.target: 缓存公开了一些用于快照行为的控件。两个最重要的控件是内存限制。有一个下限， cache-snapshot-memory-size ，如果超过该大小，将触发对TSM文件的快照并删除相应的WAL段。还有一个上限 cache-max-memory-size ，超过该上限将导致Cache拒绝新的写入。这些配置对于防止内存不足的情况很有用，并且可以以比实例可以持久的速度更快地向客户端写入数据施加背压。每次写入时都会检查内存阈值。

trans-unit.source: The Cache is an in-memory copy of all data points current stored in the WAL. The points are organized by the key, which is the measurement, tag set, and unique field. Each field is kept as its own time-ordered range. The Cache data is not compressed while in memory.
trans-unit.target: 高速缓存是WAL中当前存储的所有数据点的内存中副本。这些点由键组织，即测量，标签集和唯一字段。每个字段都保留为自己的时间范围。缓存数据不在内存中时被压缩。

trans-unit.source: The StatsD plugin will also no longer save it’s state on a service reload. Essentially we have reverted PR #887. The reason for this is that saving the state in a global variable is not thread-safe (see #1975 & #2102), and this creates issues if users want to define multiple instances of the statsd plugin. Saving state on reload may be considered in the future, but this would need to be implemented at a higher level and applied to all plugins, not just statsd.
trans-unit.target: StatsD插件也将不再在重新加载服务时保存其状态。本质上，我们已经还原PR ＃887。这样做的原因是将状态保存在全局变量中不是线程安全的（请参阅＃1975和＃2102），如果用户要定义statsd插件的多个实例，则会产生问题。将来可能会考虑在重载时保存状态，但这需要在更高级别上实现，并应用于所有插件，而不仅仅是statsd。

trans-unit.source: The StatsD plugin will now default all “delete_” config options to “true”. This will change te default behavior for users who were not specifying these parameters in their config file.
trans-unit.target: 现在，StatsD插件将默认将所有“ delete_”配置选项设置为“ true”。对于未在配置文件中指定这些参数的用户，这将更改默认行为。

trans-unit.source: The TICKscript language is an invocation chaining language used to define data processing pipelines.
trans-unit.target: TICKscript语言是一种用于定义数据处理管道的调用链语言。

trans-unit.source: The TICKscript language is an invocation chaining language. Each script has a flat scope and each variable in the scope defines methods that can be called on it. These methods come in two flavors.
trans-unit.target: TICKscript语言是一种调用链语言。每个脚本都有一个扁平的作用域,作用域中的每个变量都定义了可以对其调用的方法。这些方法有两种味道。

trans-unit.source: The TSI engine is a significant technical advancement in InfluxDB. It offers a solution to the time-structured merge tree engine’s high series cardinality issue. With TSI, the number of series should be unbounded by the memory on the server hardware and the number of existing series will have a negligible impact on database startup time. See Paul Dix’s blogpost Path to 1 Billion Time Series: InfluxDB High Cardinality Indexing Ready for Testing for additional information.
trans-unit.target: TSI引擎是InfluxDB中的一项重大技术进步。它为时间结构化合并树引擎的高序列基数问题提供了解决方案。使用TSI，系列的数量应该不受服务器硬件上的内存的限制，而现有系列的数量对数据库启动时间的影响可以忽略不计。有关更多信息，请参阅Paul Dix的博客文章“ 十亿时间序列的路径：InfluxDB高基数索引已准备好进行测试 ”。

trans-unit.source: The WAL directory is the location of the write ahead log.
trans-unit.target: WAL目录是预写日志的位置。

trans-unit.source: The WAL is organized as a bunch of files that look like _000001.wal. The file numbers are monotonically increasing and referred to as WAL segments. When a segment reaches 10MB in size, it is closed and a new one is opened. Each WAL segment stores multiple compressed blocks of writes and deletes.
trans-unit.target: WAL被组织为一堆看起来像 _000001.wal 的文件。文件号单调增加，称为WAL段。当一个段的大小达到10MB时，它将关闭并打开一个新段。每个WAL段都存储多个压缩的写和删除块。

trans-unit.source: The advanced syntax requires a GROUP BY time() clause and a nested InfluxQL function. The query first calculates the results for the nested function at the specified GROUP BY time() interval and then applies the CUMULATIVE_SUM() function to those results.

trans-unit.source: The alert level of the alert event, one of ‘0’, ‘1’, ‘2’, or ‘3’ corresponding to ‘OK’, ‘INFO’, ‘WARNING’, and ‘CRITICAL’.
trans-unit.target: 警报事件的警报级别，对应于“确定”，“信息”，“警告”和“严重”的“ 0”，“ 1”，“ 2”或“ 3”之一。

trans-unit.source: The alert message is the text that accompanies an alert. In this example, the alert message is Your idle CPU usage is {{.Level}} at {{ index .Fields "value" }}. 😸. {{.Level}} is a template that evaluates to CRITICAL when the usage_idle data initially dip below 80% and OK when the usage_idle data first return to 80% or above. The {{ index .Fields "value" }} template prints the relevant field value that triggered the alert.
trans-unit.target: 警报消息是警报随附的文本。在此示例中，警报消息为 Your idle CPU usage is {{.Level}} at {{ index .Fields "value" }}. 😸 。 {{.Level}} 是一个模板，当 usage_idle 数据最初跌至80％以下时，评估结果为 CRITICAL ，而当 usage_idle 数据首次恢复至80％或更高时，评估结果为 OK 。该 {{ index .Fields "value" }} 模板打印相关的字段值触发警报。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time that a write waits before fsyncing. Use a duration greater than 0 to batch up multiple fsync calls. This is useful for slower disks or when experiencing WAL write contention. A value of 0s fsyncs every write to the WAL. We recommend values in the range of 0ms-100ms for non-SSD disks.
trans-unit.target: fsync之前写入等待的时间。使用大于 0 的持续时间可以批量处理多个fsync调用。这对于较慢的磁盘或遇到WAL写入争用很有用。值为 0s fsync每次写入WAL。对于非SSD磁盘，我们建议将值设置为 0ms - 100ms 。

trans-unit.source: The attribute of the retention policy that determines how long InfluxDB stores data. Data older than the duration are automatically dropped from the database. See Database Management for how to set duration.
trans-unit.target: 保留策略的属性，用于确定InfluxDB存储数据的时间。早于持续时间的数据将自动从数据库中删除。有关如何设置持续时间，请参见数据库管理。

trans-unit.source: The attribute of the retention policy that determines how many copies of the data are stored in the cluster. InfluxDB replicates data across N data nodes, where N is the replication factor.
trans-unit.target: 保留策略的属性，用于确定集群中存储了多少数据副本。InfluxDB在 N 个数据节点之间复制数据，其中 N 是复制因子。

trans-unit.source: The biggest win for us was that BoltDB used a single file as the database. At this point our most common source of bug reports were from people running out of file handles. Bolt solved the hot backup problem and the file limit problems all at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 对我们来说,最大的胜利是BoltDB使用一个文件作为数据库。此时我们最常见的bug报告来源是人们用完文件句柄。Bolt同时解决了热备份问题和文件限制问题。

trans-unit.source: The bind address to use for the RPC service for backup and restore.
trans-unit.target: 用于RPC服务进行备份和还原的绑定地址。

trans-unit.source: The blue line shows the results of the query:
trans-unit.target: 蓝线显示的是查询结果。

trans-unit.source: The body of the POST - we call this the Line Protocol - contains the time-series data that you wish to store. They consist of a measurement, tags, fields, and a timestamp. InfluxDB requires a measurement name. Strictly speaking, tags are optional but most series include tags to differentiate data sources and to make querying both easy and efficient. Both tag keys and tag values are strings. Field keys are required and are always strings, and, by default, field values are floats. The timestamp - supplied at the end of the line in Unix time in nanoseconds since January 1, 1970 UTC - is optional. If you do not specify a timestamp InfluxDB uses the server’s local nanosecond timestamp in Unix epoch. Anything that has to do with time in InfluxDB is always UTC.
trans-unit.target: POST的主体（我们称为线路协议）包含您要存储的时间序列数据。它们由度量，标签，字段和时间戳组成。 InfluxDB需要一个测量名称。严格来说，标签是可选的，但是大多数系列都包含标签以区分数据源并使查询既简单又高效。标签键和标签值都是字符串。字段键是必需的，并且始终是字符串，默认情况下，字段值是浮点数。时间戳-自1970年1月1日以来在Unix时间的行尾以纳秒为单位提供的时间戳-是可选的。如果未指定时间戳，InfluxDB将在Unix时代使用服务器的本地纳秒级时间戳。 InfluxDB中与时间有关的任何事情始终都是UTC。

trans-unit.source: The cache maximum memory size is the maximum size (in bytes) a shard’s cache can reach before it starts rejecting writes.
trans-unit.target: 高速缓存的最大内存大小是分片的高速缓存在开始拒绝写入之前可以达到的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The cache snapshot memory size is the size at which the engine will snapshot the cache and write it to a TSM file, freeing up memory.
trans-unit.target: 缓存快照内存大小是指引擎将快照缓存并写入TSM文件,释放内存的大小。

trans-unit.source: The cache snapshot write cold duration is the length of time at which the engine will snapshot the cache and write it to a new TSM file if the shard hasn’t received writes or deletes.
trans-unit.target: 高速缓存快照写冷持续时间是指如果分片尚未收到写入或删除操作，引擎将对高速缓存进行快照并将其写入新的TSM文件的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: The cached data is available at the given endpoint. The endpoint is the relative path from the API endpoint of the running task. For example if the task endpoint is at /kapacitor/v1/tasks/<task_id> and endpoint is top10, then the data can be requested from /kapacitor/v1/tasks/<task_id>/top10.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的数据在给定的端点可用。该端点是从正在运行的任务的API端点开始的相对路径。例如，如果任务端点在 /kapacitor/v1/tasks/<task_id> 并且端点是 top10 ，则可以从 /kapacitor/v1/tasks/<task_id>/top10 请求数据。

trans-unit.source: The closed source Chronograf product is deprecated and is no longer supported or developed. There is no path for upgrading to the all-new open source product. trans-unit.source: The data in orders are the raw, ten-second resolution data that reside in the two-hour RP. The data in downsampled_orders are the aggregated, 30-minute resolution data that are subject to the 52-week RP.
trans-unit.target: 在数据 orders 是原材料，十秒钟的分辨率数据驻留在两个小时的RP。 downsampled_orders 中的数据是汇总的30分钟分辨率数据，该数据受52周RP的限制。

trans-unit.source: The data in the h2o_feetmeasurement occur at six-minute time intervals. The measurement has one tag key (location) which has two tag values: coyote_creek and santa_monica. The measurement also has two fields: level description stores string field values and water_level stores float field values. All of these data are in the NOAA_water_databasedatabase.
trans-unit.target: h2o_feet 测量中的数据以六分钟的时间间隔出现。该度量具有一个标签键（ location ），该标签键具有两个标签值： coyote_creek 和 santa_monica 。该度量还具有两个字段： level description 存储字符串字段值，而 water_level 存储浮点字段值。所有这些数据都在 NOAA_water_database 数据库中。

trans-unit.source: The data is joined by time, meaning that as pairs of batches arrive from each source they will be combined into a single batch. As a result the fields from each source need to be renamed to properly namespace the fields. This is done via the .as('errors', 'views') line. In this example each measurement has only one field named sum, the joined fields will be called errors.sum and views.sum respectively.
trans-unit.target: 数据按时间合并，这意味着随着成对的批次从每个来源到达，它们将被合并为一个批次。结果，需要重命名每个源中的字段以对字段进行正确的命名空间。这是通过 .as('errors', 'views') 行完成的。在此示例中，每个度量只有一个名为 sum 的字段， views.sum 字段将分别称为 errors.sum 和views.sum。

trans-unit.source: The first alert message indicates that your idle CPU usage was CRITICAL, that is, it dipped below 80%. The specific field value that triggered the alert is 69.59999999998138.
trans-unit.target: 第一条警报消息表明您的空闲CPU使用率是 CRITICAL ，即低于 80% 。触发警报的特定字段值为 69.59999999998138 。

trans-unit.source: The first and most common explanation involves retention policies (RP). InfluxDB automatically queries data in a database’s DEFAULT RP. If your data are stored in an RP other than the DEFAULT RP, InfluxDB won’t return any results unless you specify the alternative RP.
trans-unit.target: 第一个也是最常见的解释涉及保留策略（RP）。InfluxDB自动查询数据库的 DEFAULT RP中的数据。如果您的数据存储在 DEFAULT RP 以外的RP中，除非您指定备用RP，否则InfluxDB将不会返回任何结果。

trans-unit.source: The first and most likely cause is that, by default, InfluxDB checks to enforce an RP every 30 minutes. You may need to wait for the next RP check for InfluxDB to drop data that are outside the RP’s new DURATION setting. The 30 minute interval is configurable.
trans-unit.target: 第一个也是最有可能的原因是，默认情况下，InfluxDB每30分钟检查一次实施RP。您可能需要等待下一个RP检查，以便InfluxDB删除RP的新 DURATION 设置之外的数据。30分钟间隔是可配置的。

trans-unit.source: The first and most obvious problem is one of scale. In DevOps, IoT, or APM it is easy to collect hundreds of millions or billions of unique data points every day.
trans-unit.target: 第一个也是最明显的问题是规模问题。在DevOps、IoT或APM中,每天很容易收集数亿或数十亿的独特数据点。

trans-unit.source: The first point has no tag values for the mytag1 and mytag2tag keys.
trans-unit.target: 第一点是没有标签值的 mytag1 和 mytag2 标签键。

trans-unit.source: The first preset 12-minute time boundary begins at 00:00 and ends just before 00:12. Only one raw point (8.005) falls both within the query’s first GROUP BY time() interval and in that first time boundary. Note that while the returned timestamp occurs before the start of the query’s time range, the query result excludes data that occur before the query’s time range.
trans-unit.target: 第一个预设的12分钟时间范围从 00:00 开始，直到 00:12 结束。在查询的第一个 GROUP BY time() 间隔内以及该第一个时间边界内，都只有一个原始点（ 8.005 ）。请注意，虽然返回的时间戳记发生在查询时间范围的开始之前，但是查询结果排除了查询时间范围之前的数据。

trans-unit.source: The first preset 18-minute time boundary begins at 00:00 and ends just before 00:18. Two raw points (8.005 and 7.887) fall both within the first GROUP BY time() interval and in that first time boundary. Note that while the returned timestamp occurs before the start of the query’s time range, the query result excludes data that occur before the query’s time range.
trans-unit.target: 第一个预设的18分钟时间范围是从 00:00 开始，然后在 00:18 之前结束。两个原始点（ 8.005 和 7.887 ）的第一内下降既 GROUP BY time() 间隔和在该第一时间界限。请注意，虽然返回的时间戳记发生在查询时间范围的开始之前，但是查询结果将排除查询时间范围之前的数据。

trans-unit.source: The first problem we had was that LevelDB doesn’t support hot backups. If you want to do a safe backup of the database, you have to close it and then copy it. The LevelDB variants RocksDB and HyperLevelDB fix this problem, but there was another more pressing problem that we didn’t think they could solve.
trans-unit.target: 我们遇到的第一个问题是LevelDB不支持热备份。如果要对数据库进行安全备份，则必须将其关闭然后复制。LevelDB的RocksDB和HyperLevelDB变体解决了此问题，但是还有另一个更紧迫的问题，我们认为它们无法解决。

trans-unit.source: The first query in the codeblock below does not include fill(). The last time interval has no data so the reported value for that time interval is zero. The second query includes fill(800000); it replaces the zero in the last interval with 800000.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码块中的第一个查询不包含 fill() 。最后一个时间间隔没有数据，因此该时间间隔的报告值为零。第二个查询包括 fill(800000) ；它用 800000 替换最后一个间隔中的零。

trans-unit.source: The first query in the codeblock below returns the smallest field values in the water_level field key for two tag values associated with the location tag key. It also writes those results to the bottom_water_levels measurement.

trans-unit.source: The first query in the codeblock below uses the DISTINCT() function and returns four results. Notice that each result has the same timestamp. The second query adds an INTO clause to the initial query and writes the query results to the distincts measurement. The last query in the codeblock selects all the data in the distincts measurement.
trans-unit.target: 下面代码块中的第一个查询使用 DISTINCT() 函数并返回四个结果。请注意，每个结果都有相同的时间戳。第二个查询在初始查询中添加一个 INTO 子句，并将查询结果写入 distincts 测量。代码块中的最后一个查询选择 distincts 测量中的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: The first query returns InfluxDB’s null timestamp equivalent (epoch 0: 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z) as the timestamp. FIRST(*) returns two timestamps (one for each field key in the h2o_feetmeasurement) so the system overrides those timestamps with the null timestamp equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 第一个查询返回InfluxDB的null时间戳等效值（epoch 0： 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z ）作为时间戳。 FIRST(*) 返回两个时间戳（对于 h2o_feet 测量中的每个字段键一个），因此系统将使用等效的null时间戳覆盖这些时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The first result (0.00014444444444444457) is the one-second rate of change between the first two subsequent field values in the raw data. InfluxDB calculates the difference between the field values and normalizes that value to the one-second rate of change:

trans-unit.source: The first result (0.01733333333333335) is the two-minute rate of change between the first two subsequent field values in the raw data. InfluxDB calculates the difference between the field values and normalizes that value to the two-minute rate of change:
trans-unit.target: 第一个结果（ 0.01733333333333335 ）是原始数据中前两个后续字段值之间的两分钟变化率。InfluxDB计算字段值之间的差异，并将该值标准化为两分钟的变化率：

trans-unit.source: The first result (0.026000000000000023) is the three-minute rate of change between the first two subsequent field values in the raw data. InfluxDB calculates the difference between the field values and normalizes that value to the three-minute rate of change:
trans-unit.target: 第一个结果（ 0.026000000000000023 ）是原始数据中前两个后续字段值之间的三分钟变化率。InfluxDB计算字段值之间的差异，并将该值标准化为三分钟的变化率：

trans-unit.source: The first result (0.052000000000000046) is the six-minute rate of change between the first two subsequent field values in the raw data. InfluxDB calculates the difference between the field values and normalizes that value to the six-minute rate of change:
trans-unit.target: 第一个结果（ 0.052000000000000046 ）是原始数据中前两个后续字段值之间的六分钟变化率。InfluxDB计算字段值之间的差异，并将该值标准化为六分钟的变化率：

trans-unit.source: The following sections cover how to create, alter, and delete retention policies. Note that when you create a database, InfluxDB automatically creates a retention policy named autogen which has infinite retention. You may rename that retention policy or disable its auto-creation in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 以下各节介绍如何创建，更改和删除保留策略。请注意，当您创建数据库时，InfluxDB会自动创建一个名为 autogen 的保留策略，该策略具有无限的保留期。您可以在配置文件中重命名该保留策略或禁用其自动创建。

trans-unit.target: 通用的OAuth2提供者有一些可选的参数。

trans-unit.source: The generic OAuth2 provider is very similar to the Github provider, but, you are able to set your own authentication, token, and API URLs. The callback URL path will be /oauth/generic/callback. So, if your Chronograf is hosted at https://localhost:8888 then the full callback URL would be https://localhost:8888/oauth/generic/callback.
trans-unit.target: 通用的OAuth2提供程序与Github提供程序非常相似，但是您可以设置自己的身份验证，令牌和API URL。回调URL路径为 /oauth/generic/callback 。因此，如果您的Chronograf托管在 https://localhost:8888 上,则完整的回调URL将是 https://localhost:8888/oauth/generic/callback 。

trans-unit.source: The global interval for flushing data from each output plugin to its destination. This value should not be set lower than the collection interval.

The time range selector in the top right corner adjusts the graph’s time range. Use this feature when determining a reasonable threshold number based on your data.

trans-unit.source: The hardware recommendations for cluster data nodes are similar to the standalone instance recommendations. Data nodes should always have at least 2 CPU cores, as they must handle regular read and write traffic, as well as intra-cluster read and write traffic. Due to the cluster communication overhead, data nodes in a cluster handle less throughput than a standalone instance on the same hardware.
trans-unit.target: 集群数据节点的硬件建议与独立实例建议类似。数据节点应始终拥有至少2个CPU核,因为它们必须处理常规的读写流量,以及集群内的读写流量。由于集群通信开销,集群中的数据节点处理的吞吐量比相同硬件上的独立实例要少。

trans-unit.target: 进口文件有两个部分。

trans-unit.source: The in-memory Cache is recreated on restart by re-reading the WAL files on disk.
trans-unit.target: 内存中的Cache会在重新启动时通过重新读取磁盘上的WAL文件来重新创建。

trans-unit.source: The increase in RAM needs relative to series cardinality is exponential where the exponent is between one and two:
trans-unit.target: RAM需求相对于系列卡数的增加是指数型的,其中指数在1到2之间。

trans-unit.source: The index structure can provide efficient access to all blocks as well as the ability to determine the cost associated with accessing a given key. Given a key and timestamp, we can determine whether a file contains the block for that timestamp. We can also determine where that block resides and how much data must be read to retrieve the block. Knowing the size of the block, we can efficiently provision our IO statements.
trans-unit.target: 索引结构可以提供对所有区块的有效访问,以及确定与访问给定密钥相关的成本的能力。给定一个键和时间戳,我们可以确定一个文件是否包含该时间戳的块。我们还可以确定该块所在的位置,以及必须读取多少数据才能检索到该块。知道了块的大小,我们就可以有效地提供我们的IO语句。

trans-unit.source: The information in the < > shows the measurement and the tag set of the series that exceeded max-series-per-database.
trans-unit.target: 中的信息 < > 中的显示了超出 max-series-per-database 的系列的度量值和标签集。

trans-unit.source: The input will flush at least this often even if it hasn’t reached the configured batch-size.
trans-unit.target: 即使输入尚未达到配置的批处理大小，它也会至少经常刷新一次。

trans-unit.source: The input will flush if this many points get buffered.
trans-unit.target: 如果有这么多点被缓冲,输入就会被冲掉。

trans-unit.source: The intent is that the Message property be a single line summary while the Details property is a more detailed message possibly spanning multiple lines, and containing HTML formatting.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的目的是,Message 属性是一个单行摘要,而 Details 属性则是一个更详细的消息,可能跨越多行,并包含 HTML 格式。

trans-unit.source: The intent of the API is to allow for dynamic configuration of sensitive credentials without requiring that the Kapacitor process be restarted. As such, it is recommended to use either the configuration file or the API to manage these configuration sections, but not both. This will help to eliminate any confusion that may arise as to the source of a given configuration option.
trans-unit.target: API的目的是允许动态配置敏感凭证,而不需要重新启动Kapacitor进程。因此,建议使用配置文件或 API 来管理这些配置部分,但不要同时使用。这将有助于消除任何可能出现的关于特定配置选项来源的混淆。

trans-unit.source: The interface we need to implement is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 我们需要实现的接口如下。

trans-unit.source: The internal input plugin uses the wrong units for heap_objects.
trans-unit.target: 内部输入插件将错误的单位用于 heap_objects 。

trans-unit.source: The interval at which InfluxDB checks to see if a CQ needs to run. Set this option to the lowest interval at which your CQs run. For example, if your most frequent CQ runs every minute, set run-interval to 1m.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB检查是否需要运行CQ的时间间隔。将此选项设置为您的CQ运行的最低间隔。例如，如果您最频繁的CQ每分钟运行一次，请将 run-interval 设置为 1m 。

trans-unit.source: The interval at which InfluxDB records statistics.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB记录统计数据的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The interval represents how often to emit the statistics based on real time. This means the interval time is independent of the times of the data points the other node is receiving. As a result the StatsNode is a root node in the task pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 间隔表示基于实时发出统计信息的频率。这意味着间隔时间与另一个节点正在接收的数据点的时间无关。结果是 StatsNode是任务管道中的根节点。

trans-unit.target: 介绍性文档中包含了所有你所需要的信息,以便于你启动和运行InfluxDB。

trans-unit.target: 介绍性文件包含了你需要的所有信息,让你可以开始使用Kapacitor。

trans-unit.source: The introductory documentation includes all the information you need to get up and running with Telegraf.
trans-unit.target: 介绍性文件包括了您需要的所有信息,让您可以开始使用Telegraf。

trans-unit.source: The join can be an inner or outer join, see the JoinNode.Fill property.
trans-unit.target: 联接可以是内部联接，也可以是外部联接，请参见JoinNode.Fill属性。

trans-unit.source: The join process skips points that do not have a matching point in time from the other source. As a result it is important to both groupBy and fill the data while joining batch data. Grouping the data by time ensures that each source has data points at consistent time values. Filling the data ensures every point will have a match with a sane default.
trans-unit.target: 加入过程会从其他来源跳过时间点不匹配的点。因此，在加入批处理数据的同时对 groupBy 和 fill 数据都非常重要。按时间分组数据可确保每个源在一致的时间值处都有数据点。填充数据可确保每个点都具有默认的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The key part of the key-value pair that makes up a field. Field keys are strings and they store metadata.
trans-unit.target: 组成字段的键值对的键部分。字段键是字符串,它们存储元数据。

trans-unit.source: The key part of the key-value pair that makes up a tag. Tag keys are strings and they store metadata. Tag keys are indexed so queries on tag keys are performant.
trans-unit.target: 构成标签的键值对的键部分。标签键是字符串,它们存储元数据。标签键是有索引的,所以对标签键的查询是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The key-value pair in InfluxDB’s data structure that records metadata and the actual data value. Fields are required in InfluxDB’s data structure and they are not indexed - queries on field values scan all points that match the specified time range and, as a result, are not performant relative to tags.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB数据结构中的键值对，用于记录元数据和实际数据值。InfluxDB的数据结构中必填字段，并且不对它们进行索引-字段值查询会扫描与指定时间范围匹配的所有点，因此，相对于标签而言，这些字段不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The key-value pair in InfluxDB’s data structure that records metadata. Tags are an optional part of InfluxDB’s data structure but they are useful for storing commonly-queried metadata; tags are indexed so queries on tags are performant. Query tip: Compare tags to fields; fields are not indexed.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB数据结构中记录元数据的键值对。标记是InfluxDB数据结构的可选部分，但对于存储常见查询的元数据很有用。标签已编入索引，因此对标签的查询性能很高。查询提示：将标签与字段进行比较；字段未编制索引。

trans-unit.source: The keyword time is a special case. time can be a continuous query name, database name, measurement name, retention policy name, subscription name, and user name. In those cases, time does not require double quotes in queries. time cannot be a field key or tag key; InfluxDB rejects writes with time as a field key or tag key and returns an error.
trans-unit.target: 关键字 time 是一种特殊情况。 time 可以是连续查询名称，数据库名称，度量名称，保留策略名称，订阅名称和用户名。在这些情况下， time 不需要查询中的双引号。 time 不能是字段键或标签键 ; InfluxDB拒绝随着 time 写入作为字段键或标签键，并返回错误。
